caption.center: EARL BUTLER, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal pursuant to Fla.R.App.P. 9.141(b)(2) from the Circuit Court for Highlands County; Peter F. Estrada, Judge.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed. See Edmondson v. State, 854 So. 2d 751 (Fla. 2d DCA 2003); Blake v. State. 807 So. 2d 772 (Fla. 2d DCA 2002); Brown v. State,793 So. 2d 27 (Fla. 2d DCA 2001).
VILLANTI, WALLACE, and LaROSE, JJ., Concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DETERMINED.
